thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First trip to Rome.
thread.title_full: First trip to Rome. - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Donald W
title: First trip to Rome.
text:
We really enjoyed our stay here. Four days only and we were very well looked after. All the staff are extremely professional and also friendly and welcoming. Our room was nice and comfortable with fresh changes every day. We ate in the roof top restaurant which is top quality. We made the mistake of only booking one meal there!
This was a special occasion for me and the hotel lived up to our expectations and more with some little special touches. We shall return.
